DECLARE @json_construct varchar(MAX) = '{"type": "TabularTranslator", 
         "mappings":';
;with cte as (
SELECT TABLE_NAME AS TableName
       , COLUMN_NAME AS ColName
	   , "DATA_TYPE" =
	CASE 
	   WHEN DATA_TYPE LIKE 'varchar%' THEN 'String'
	   WHEN DATA_TYPE LIKE 'INT%' THEN 'Int32'
	   WHEN DATA_TYPE LIKE '%CHAR%' THEN 'String'
	   WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'uniqueidentifier' THEN 'Guid'
	   ELSE 'String'
    END
  FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
)

--select * 
--from cte

SELECT  CONCAT(  @json_construct, '[',
    STRING_AGG(
        CONCAT('
		         {
		         "source":{
		             "name":"' ,c.ColName, '"
			     },
                          "sink":{
				 "name":"',   c.ColName, ',
			         "type":"',c.DATA_TYPE,'"
				 }
				}')
    ,','),
    ']
	}') as json_output
FROM cte as c
where  c.[TableName] = 'emp'
